text: Edzard Schmidt-Jortzig (born 8 October 1941) is a German jurist. He worked at University of Kiel. He is a member of the Free Democratic Party. He was German Federal Minister of Justice in the Cabinet Kohl V between 1996 and 1998. He was born in Berlin.Biography at the German Bundestag ==References== Category:1941 births Category:Living people Category:Jurists Category:Politicians of the Free Democratic Party of Germany Category:Politicians from Berlin Category:Justice ministers of Germany
title: Edzard Schmidt-Jortzig
